sentences.sentence: Personally, I do not believe in any of these slimming gadgets.
sentences.translation: 就我个人而言，我不相信这些减肥的小玩意。

sentences.sentence: I'm overwhelmed with the wide range of different slimming products each year.
sentences.translation: 每年我都对各种各样的减肥产品感到不知所措。

sentences.sentence: Apart from what people eat, I've also seen many interesting slimming products.
sentences.translation: 除了吃的，我还看到了很多有趣的减肥产品。
